title: Retry build and resolve deployment error

requirements.text: Investigate the current build/deployment failure, identify the root cause, and implement the minimal code/configuration changes required so the project builds and deploys successfully again.
acceptanceCriteria: A clean build completes successfully without compilation/type errors in both backend (Motoko) and frontend (React/TypeScript).
A deploy completes successfully without runtime traps during canister install/upgrade.
The deployed app loads in the browser and the core routes render without a blank screen (at minimum: / for unauthenticated users and /seller-dashboard after authentication).
No changes are made to any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

constraints: Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister with logic in backend/main.mo; add backend/migration.mo only if a state upgrade is required by the fix.

Do not modify any frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Use English for any user-facing text introduced or modified by the fix.
nonGoals: Implementing new product features, UI redesign work, or additional pages unrelated to unblocking build/deploy.
Changing authentication providers (must remain Internet Identity).
